name: I'm Peachie!
description:
How are you? I'm Peachie! No, not who are you. How are you? Well... I guess in that case I'm not Peachie! Peachie's all that's good in the world. A cheery force of positive energy. She's doing just fine! Completely fine! Nothing wrong here! 

CONTENT WARNING:  THEMES OF DEPRESSION, ANXIETY,  ADHD,  ABUSE,  SUICIDE AND SELF-HARM. THIS GAME IS NOT SUITABLE FOR THOSE WHO SUFFER FROM EPILEPSY OR PHOTOPHOBIA.
